reasoning: Mature B-cell NHL represents ~50-60% of all NHL cases. Global NHL incidence ~20-25 per 100k from GLOBOCAN; mature B-cell NHL estimated ~12 per 100k. Data from international lymphoma registries and WHO classification.
source: Parkin DM et al. (2005). Global cancer statistics, 2002. CA Cancer J Clin. 55(2):74-108
